column2: The commander of besiegers of [From.Siege.GetName] taunted the defenders.
The morale of defenders of [From.Siege.GetName] have increased after inspirational speech from the commander.
The morale of besiegers of [From.Siege.GetName] have increased after inspirational speech from the commander.
During the cover of night fearing for their life many defenders of [From.Siege.GetName] have deserted.
During the cover of night fearing for their life many besiegers of [From.Siege.GetName] have deserted.
The defenders of §Y[From.Siege.GetName]§! launched a night raids against the besiegers, inflicting casualties and sabotaging supplies.

The siege camp outside §Y[From.Siege.GetName]§! have attracted all manner of rabble - mercenaries, prostitutes, looters and merchant in hopes to earning something bolstering their ranks and strenghtening morale.
The peasants of §Y[From.Siege.GetName]§! have joined the ranks of defenders.
